title: sir_danny
author: sir_danny
content: “If folks want to bury their head in the sand, they can go right ahead. The reality is Bitcoin is helping millions of people protect their assets from confiscation and censorship and debasement and demonetization everywhere from Cuba to Palestine to Nigeria to China.”-~ Alex Gladstein, Human Rights FoundationWalletScrutiny.com does its part by laying the groundwork for an important aspect of bitcoin, the scrutiny of the software that allows people to use bitcoin.

comments.author: sir_danny
comments.body: Before you buy a hardware wallet. We have the most complete list of wallets, period.
